thread.title: ‘American Idol’ contestant to visit Pendleton center
thread.title_full: ‘American Idol’ contestant to visit Pendleton center

title: ‘American Idol’ contestant to visit Pendleton center
text: Print this article Advertisement PENDLETON — Josh Gracin from “American Idol” will perform an evening of acoustic music at 7 p.m. Nov. 5 at Pendleton Center for the Arts, 214 N. Main St. The doors will open at 6:30 p.m. Tickets, $20 each, are very limited and going fast. To reserve a seat, call 541-278-9201. Gracin, a former U.S. Marine, is hitting the road throughout the Pacific Northwest in November to re-connect with audiences and to celebrate the U.S. Marine Corps’ birthday, Nov. 10 and Veteran’s Day, Nov. 11. For more information, call 541-278-9201. More like this story
